markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs=""
>
[Extraction Cauldron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1706)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Blood Lords</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #182: Graveclaw](/Sources.aspx?ID=143) pg. 75</row>

**Price** 85 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 6
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This large magical stew pot can boil objects down to their valuable components, greatly assisting anyone who wants to harvest raw materials without visiting a settlement. The cauldron is roughly 3 feet in diameter.

<document level="2" id="action-1273" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
